attributes.action: Force tobacco companies to list every chemical added to tobacco products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tobacco companies should not be exempt from the law to list every single chemical added to their products on the packets as well as provide an enclosed leaflet warning of the adverse side effects and dangers of addiction from ingesting these chemicals just as all other consumable suppliers have to comply with. This would act as a strong deterrent to our children and warn them that just one cigarette will cost them dearly for the rest of their shortened lives.
